firstImpression.title: Kruceo Mode
firstImpression.box1Text: Feel free to explore and collaborate on open-source projects. Your contributions and insights are valued as the projects continue to evolve. Join the community effort to enhance and refine these solutions, promoting a collaborative environment for innovation and shared knowledge.
firstImpression.box2Text: Kruceo recognizes the value of modularity in efficiently organizing its projects, demonstrating dedication to scalable solutions that significantly contribute to the project's success.
firstImpression.box3Text: Kruceo has efficient and intuitive solutions at the core of its projects, emphasizing a commitment to simplified and user-friendly results.
firstImpression.box4Text: Kruceo values continuous learning, recognizing it as a foundation for personal and professional growth. This commitment highlights an ongoing dedication to staying informed, adapting to evolving trends, and improving skills.

projects.title: Highlights
projects.item2Desc: A transaction manager focused on seafood products with multiple features.

about.title: About
about.item1Text: Kruceo is a full-stack developer with a strong background in software and web development. His knowledge in frontend and backend allows him to contribute solutions to all parts of a project.
about.item2Text: With expertise in reactive technologies and style sheets, along with his own stack, Kruceo delivers modern, efficient, and scalable projects.
about.item3Text: His full-stack development skills cover all stages of a project, from conception to implementation, ensuring a comprehensive and integrated approach.
